text: in this particular pond we have another incredible function happening here in the food forest which is that by turning a simple valve I can actually flood irrigate systems in this food forest that will water trees and plants with this fertile pond water full of beneficial microorganisms bacteria nutrients from from the fish from d'être this which is decomposing plant matter that that falls to the bottom of the pond water and gets munched by all the microorganisms so you have this alive water we're actually fertilizing the entire food forest at the same time that we're irrigating it
